verses.verse: And He went into the synagogue again, and a person was there who had the hand that had been shriveled up.
And they were watching Him closely whether He would heal him on the Sabbaths so that they might level a complaint against Him.
And He says to the person, the one who has the hand that had been shriveled up, "Get up in the middle."
And He says to them, "Is it permitted on the Sabbaths to do good or to do bad? To rescue a soul or to kill?" But the people were silent.

And after He looked around at them with rage, being saddened over the stone hardness of their hearts, He says to the person, "Put out your hand." And he put it out, and his hand was reestablished healthy, as the other.
And when the Separatists went out right away with the Herod supporters, they were taking counsel against Him on how they might ruin Him.
And Jesus took a back way to the sea with His students, and a very large number from Galilee followed Him, also from Judea,
from Greater Jerusalem, and from Idumaea, the other side of the Jordan River, and the people around Tyre and Sidon. As a very large number heard as many things as He was doing, they came to Him.
And He told His students that a small boat should stay close to Him because of the crowd so that they may not squeeze Him.
You see, He healed many in such a way for them to be falling on Him so that as many as had ailments might touch Him.
And whenever the spirits, the ones that were not clean, were seeing Him, they were falling close to Him and yelling, saying, "You are the Son of God."
And He was forbidding many spirits in them so that they would not make Him known.
And He climbs up into the mountain and calls for whom He was wanting. And they went off to Him.
And He made twelve so that they may be with Him and so that He may send them out on missions to be speaking publicly
and to be having authority to be healing the illnesses and to be throwing out the demons.
Simon (He added to Simon a name, Peter),
James (the son of Zebedee), John (the brother of James; He also added names to them, Boanerges, that is Hebrew for Sons of Thunder),
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, James (the son of Alphaeus), Thaddeus, Simon (the Kananite â€” Aramaic for Zealot),
and Judas, an Iscariot (who also turned Him in). And He went into a house,
and the crowd again came together in such a way for them not to be able to even eat bread.
And when the people from the side of Him heard, they went out to take Him into custody. You see, they were saying that He was deranged.
And the Old Testament transcribers, the ones who walked down out of Greater Jerusalem, were saying that He has Beelzebub and that with the head of the demons He is throwing out the demons.
And after calling for them, He was talking to them in illustrations, "How is the Opponent able to be throwing the Opponent out?
And if an empire is divided on itself, that empire is not able to be established.
And if a house is divided on itself, that house is not able to be established.
And if the Opponent stands up on himself and has been divided, he is not able to be established, but has a conclusion.
No one is able to ransack the containers of the strong person after going into his house unless he first ties up the strong person, and then he will ransack his house.
Amen, I tell you that all sins will be forgiven to the sons of the people and hurtful comments, however many hurtful things they might say.
But whoever says hurtful things in reference to the Spirit, the Sacred Spirit, does not have forgiveness for the span of time, but he is confined for judgment that spans all time."
He said this because they were saying, "He has a spirit that is not clean."
So His brothers and mother come. And having stood outside, they sent out someone to Him, hollering at Him.
And a crowd was sitting around Him. They said to Him, "Look, Your mother and Your brothers outside are looking for You."
And He responded to them, saying, "Who is My mother or My brothers?"
And after looking around in a circle at the people sitting around Him, He says, "Look, My mother and My brothers.
You see, whoever does what God wants, this person is My brother, My sister, and mother."
